metadata.title: CVE-2016-9179 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: lynx: It was found that Lynx doesn't parse the authority component of theURL correctly when the host name part ends with '?', and could instead betricked into connecting to a different host.

criterions.comment: lynx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
